meta.title: DonLeo — Your AI Dating Wingman
meta.description: Instant replies + real coaching. DonLeo keeps you smooth, funny, and in control.

hero.subtitle: Upload a screenshot. Get perfect replies in your exact vibe. Chat with DonLeo when you need a wingman.

modes.title: Five flavors of smooth
modes.subtitle: Whatever the situation, there's a vibe that works. Pick your mode, get a reply that actually lands.

smooth.name: Smooth & Direct
smooth.description: Confident & clear. When you mean business.

funny.name: Funny & Cheesy
funny.description: Break the ice. Make them laugh (with you, not at you).

short.name: Short & Punchy
short.description: Keep it moving. Low effort, high impact.

nerd.name: Nerd / Pop Culture
nerd.description: Find common ground. Reference smart, reference right.

savage.name: Savage & Witty
savage.description: Bold energy. For when you need to make a move.

wingman.title: Your AI wingman (who actually gets it)
wingman.subtitle: Stuck on what to say? Overanalyzing every comma? DonLeo helps you read signals, craft replies, and stay confident. Share a screenshot or paste text—get instant coaching + options that sound like you.
wingman.feature1Desc: Understand what they're actually saying (not just what they typed)
wingman.feature2Desc: Multiple reply suggestions. Pick the one that feels right.
wingman.feature3Desc: Rewrite your message before you hit send. No regrets.
wingman.feature4Desc: Know where you stand. No more guessing games.
wingman.chatMessage1: Hey! I noticed you've been chatting with Sarah for a few days. How's it going?
wingman.chatMessage2: Pretty good! But I'm not sure if she's actually interested...
wingman.chatMessage3: Let me help! Share the convo and I'll tell you what's really going on.

privacy.title: Your business stays yours
privacy.description: Screenshots are processed once and never stored. Chats are encrypted. We don't train on your data. What happens in DonLeo, stays in DonLeo.

howItWorks.title: Three steps to smooth
howItWorks.subtitle: From staring at your phone to hitting send—fast.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose the mode that matches the moment
howItWorks.step3Desc: Paste it in the chat. You got this.

pricing.title: Try free. Upgrade when you're winning.
pricing.description: 10 free replies every day. Unlimited when you're ready to level up.

dashboard.ready: Ready to level up your dating game?

chatCard.title: Chat with DonLeo
chatCard.subtitle: Your personal AI wingman is ready to help

marketing.title: Your wingman who actually reads the room.
marketing.subtitle: Drop the context. I'll tell you what to say, what NOT to say, and why it works.
marketing.pickCard: Pick a card below to start.

analyze.title: I'll translate the subtext
analyze.description: Screenshots in. Meaning out. (Yes, even that 'haha'.)

replies.title: 3 replies. Zero panic.
replies.description: Pick the vibe: smooth, funny, savage... you stay you. From 'left on read' to 'damn.'

rewrite.title: Upgrade your draft
rewrite.description: Same message, upgraded delivery. No cringe tax.

thinking.title: What's the play here?
thinking.description: I'll map the next move so you don't fumble the moment.

rizz.title: DonLeo
rizz.subtitle: Upload a screenshot. Get instant replies that actually work.
rizz.emptyState: Upload a screenshot and pick a mode to get started

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Let's get you back in the game

signup.title: Create an account
signup.subtitle: Let's get you started. Level up your dating game today.
signup.name: Name
signup.freeTrial: 10 free responses daily. No credit card required.

errors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Try again later.

upgrade.title: Upgrade to Premium
upgrade.description: Unlimited responses. Priority support. No brainer.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.subtitle: Manage your plan. Start with a 3-day free trial.

legal.privacyIntro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
legal.privacyBullets1: We collect only the information needed to provide our AI-powered dating coaching service
legal.privacyBullets2: We use end-to-end encryption for all chat conversations and screenshots
legal.privacyBullets3: We never share your personal conversations with third parties
legal.privacyBullets4: You can request deletion of your data at any time by contacting our support team
legal.privacyBullets5: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience
legal.dataUsageText: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including generating personalized dating advice and coaching responses.
legal.yourRightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. Contact us at support@donleo.app for any requests.
legal.contactText: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
legal.termsIntro: By using DonLeo, you agree to these terms of service.
legal.acceptanceText: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
legal.accountBullets1: You must be at least 18 years old to use our service
legal.accountBullets2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
legal.accountBullets3: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account
legal.accountBullets4: You must not share your account with anyone else
legal.contentBullets1: You may not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
legal.contentBullets2: You may not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
legal.contentBullets3: You may not interfere with other users' experience
legal.contentBullets4: You are solely responsible for all content you generate through our AI assistant
legal.paymentBullets1: We offer various subscription plans with different durations and features
legal.paymentBullets2: Payments are processed securely through third-party providers
legal.paymentBullets3: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings
legal.paymentBullets4: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis
legal.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms.
legal.aboutText: DonLeo is your AI-powered dating wingman, designed to help you navigate conversations with confidence and authenticity.
legal.missionText: To help people build genuine connections through thoughtful, personalized communication guidance.
legal.storyText: Founded in 2024, DonLeo was created to solve the common problem of "what do I say?" in modern dating. We believe that authentic communication leads to better relationships.
legal.teamText: We're a small team of dating experts and AI engineers passionate about helping you find meaningful connections.
legal.supportHoursText: Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm CET. Weekends and holidays may take longer.

deleteAccount.warning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.modalDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This will permanently delete all your data and cannot be undone.
